body: Here is a [PR](https://github.com/apache/rocketmq/pull/1083) about slave miscalculate the report time, you can have a try.

Coverage decreased (-0.03%) to 50.593% when pulling **16d62a7c0cab3735e8ad9d2a26284dd26ef5ffbc on ShadowySpirits:fix-select-one-mq** into **c3b7d18603d7d599a336703e871b86607958fc92 on apache:develop**.

其实没必要，因为trace消息也是普通的消息，本身有bornHost，这个就是客户端ip，没必要在trace内容里再加上。
仅仅是展示trace数据的时候，把消息的bornHost赋给TraceBean的clientHost就行了。
从这点可以看出，trace数据的作者可是费心了，尽量减少数据传输。

Add some personal guesses

safepoint log as follow:
27123.445: PrintThreads                     [     232          0              0    ]      [     0     0     0     0  1303    ]  0  
27183.285: PrintThreads                     [     232          0              0    ]      [     0     0     0     0  1555    ]  0   
27243.350: PrintThreads                     [     232          0              0    ]      [     0     0     0     0  1776    ]  0   
27303.652: PrintThreads                     [     232          0              0    ]      [     0     0     0     0  2002    ]  0   
27363.195: PrintThreads                     [     232          0              0    ]      [     0     0     0     0  2259    ]  0   
27423.006: PrintThreads                     [     232          0              0    ]      [     0     0     0     0  2537    ]  0  

I found that every two PrintThreads is exactly 60s,So I wonder if there's a scheduled task,
Otherwise I can't understand why all the two PrintThreads are exactly 60s between them.
@duhenglucky Could you give some advice or guess?

> @X-ration thanks for your suggestion, this start script gives a more common configuration. Would you like to propose a PR to add this question to Q&A?

I could not fully understand it, so what is a PR and how can I propose a PR to add the question to Q&A?
conf/2m-2s-sync/broker-a.properties
主要是刚启动起来，然后就自动退出

@duhenglucky I use top -Hp 10227, and I get the thread PID that has the highest CPU in process 10227, and then I use ‘printf %x\n’ to transform this thread PID into its hexadecimal representation,0x2889,and at last I use jstack 10277|grep 0x2889 -A 30, and I find the one of the highest CPU thread name in process 10277 is Async-appended-worker, and the other threads in process 10277 which have as high CPU as Async-appended-worker are  Netty threads such as nettyserverthread, nettyNIOthread, and nettycodecthrrad.I do not know why, because I try the same in another rocketmq cluster which has the same cluster configuration, and I find that the CPU of slave broker do not raise, so I suspect system parameter of Linux is the cause???

@walterhong What you said seems makes sense. It is recommended to check the relevant configuration of sysctl, especially the related configuration in os.sh. In addition, it is recommended to execute os.sh before service started, which optimizes the default values of some os kernels parameters.
@ltyeamin 启动命令可以发一下吗？有没有其他的一些core 文件，一起看下。
有必要。队列锁能保证同一个队列的ConsumeRequest在线程池被消费不会是乱序的，ProcessQueue的consuming状态位无法代替锁的作用。

@antianchi 可以看下store日志确认下consume queue的构建有没有被卡住，offset是在消息写入的时候就确定了，有一个Reput线程会异步构建CQ，参考这部分代码org.apache.rocketmq.store.DefaultMessageStore.ReputMessageService看下有没有什么异常。
@2259289435 could you help to review and verify this [PR](https://github.com/apache/rocketmq/pull/1303), it seems that this PR will resolve your issue.

你说的**consume queue的构建有没有被卡住**，我不是很明白。grep日志发现了这么一句。
`2019-11-26 10:50:23 WARN WriteSocketService - Offset not matched. Request offset: 11811160064, firstOffset: 7696547840, lastOffset: 10758389760, mappedFileSize: 20971520, mappedFiles count: 146

2019-11-26 10:50:52 WARN FlushConsumeQueueService - Offset not matched. Request offset: 45281320, firstOffset: 0, lastOffset: 300000, mappedFileSize: 300000, mappedFiles count: 1
2019-11-26 10:50:53 WARN FlushConsumeQueueService - Offset not matched. Request offset: 45281320, firstOffset: 0, lastOffset: 300000, mappedFileSize: 300000, mappedFiles count: 1
`
关于ReputMessageService的异常，只发现了一条，我也不明白什么意思。


现在，我把Broker通过mqshutdown关掉，然后重新启动了，现在可以正常的发送消息，消费消息，且状态如下：
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/25560330/69596600-1421d600-103e-11ea-8a5f-073214e35da8.png)

pelease help me ! THank you!!
seems repeated with this [issue](https://github.com/apache/rocketmq/issues/1618)

我们实际在做消息轨迹的展示的时候不会多余的再去调用一遍queryMessageById的接口。所有trace消息的数据来源都是trace消息本身的内容。

其实没必要，因为每条消息本身有bornHost，这个就是客户端ip，没必要在trace信息里再加上。
 仅仅是展示trace数据的时候，把消息的bornHost赋给TraceBean的clientHost就行了。

你没明白我说啥，给你[代码](https://github.com/sohutv/mqcloud/blob/master/mq-cloud/src/main/java/com/sohu/tv/mq/cloud/service/MessageService.java#L828)自己看吧
再说明白点，pub类型的trace消息的bornHost就是客户端生产者的ip，sub类型的trace消息的bornHost就是客户端消费者的ip。

Sorry for the delay, the integration is very simple, just config in the root pom and it will work when run "mvn clean install", it will fail when it catch potential problems match error-prone bug patterns, such as this one:  http://errorprone.info/bugpattern/DeadException

In this way, with little change, we could introduce error-prone and it will improve our code quality in future I think.
@leoxchang 这个问题社区正在进行修复，最近会有一个优化，另外还有一个[PR](https://github.com/apache/rocketmq/pull/1303) 在解决这个问题，您可以验证一下，用来暂时解决你的问题。
@intodream recommend using AdminTools to create the topic, exposing the createTopic interface to users will bring huge risks.
@vongosling @Jason918 @liuruiyiyang @duhenglucky @RongtongJin please help to review this pr together.Thanks
@intodream org.apache.rocketmq.tools.admin.DefaultMQAdminExt

> 有必要。队列锁能保证同一个队列的ConsumeRequest在线程池被消费不会是乱序的，ProcessQueue的consuming状态位无法代替锁的作用。

由于对消息的拉取是串行的，所以用ProcessQueue的consuming状态可以保证，同一个时间不会有两个ConsumeRequest，对同一个队列进行顺序消费。所以我觉得队列锁还是没有必要的。您的回答不能解决我的疑惑，如果可以的话进一步解答我的疑惑，万分感谢。

@duhenglucky 

...

@duhenglucky 
I have ran os.sh on every machine that broker is running, but when I killed the master broker, the slave broker cpu was still high. I configure master slave syncronizing mode to async, flushing disk mode to sync. The threads that has high cpu can be categorized into two types, one is nettynioselectorthread, the other is nettyservercodecthread. What the nettyservercodecthread is doing is showing in the following pictures:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16216936/70308123-9338ba80-1845-11ea-9384-8e2ff3b3eb7c.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16216936/70308133-96cc4180-1845-11ea-9dcc-72fbc29a0343.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16216936/70308140-9b90f580-1845-11ea-8fda-aacb321dbd46.png)
the pictures are content of slave broker process in jstack. I find that when master broker is down, slave broker is trying to do something very fast in org.apache.rocketmq.remoting model, which makes the cpu high.
There is another phenomenon that may cause this question. I kill master broker, and slave broker cpu is high every time I put a lot of message into rocketmq,  but when I do this when rocketmq has a few messages, the slave broker cpu is normal.
Hello, is there a repair plan for this vulnerability?  A large number of rocketmq users are affected by this security bug. @duhenglucky

@duhenglucky 
I remote debug slave broker that has high cpu,and find that request code of the highest thread in slave broker process is get_broker_runtime_info
@walterhong   did you used the rocketmq-console？and this  page will frequently call this interface and will lead to highest CPU usage.

@coffeehb Thanks for your report, especially for your request for a CVE ID. According to some relevant regulations, I must close it workaround. For the further process of the problem, please refer to the latest commits history. Thanks again for your submission:-)

@duhenglucky 
I kill rocketmq-console when slave broker CPU is high, but the CPU does not fall down

> @duhenglucky

ok, could you provide more information, or you can connect with me by Dingtalk:juicehenry
@duhenglucky check it again :)

If the "MQ client" means MQClientInstance, yes, one MQClientInstance maintains one connection to one broker(but it maintains the connections with all brokers in the cluster).
And you can create producers/consumers in any numbers in your client-side, each holds one MQClientInstance.

1. The `scanResponseTable()` method is invoked periodically(every one second), it could be late for one second for one particular reponseFuture to be scanned,  in the worst case.  So 
`(rep.getBeginTimestamp() + rep.getTimeoutMillis() + 1000) <= System.currentTimeMillis()`
does mean something.

2. Could you please change the destination branch to devleop?

Do you mean use unitName in ClientConfig.class?

主题: Re: [apache/rocketmq] What kind of consideration is it based on that one MQ client only has one connection to the broker? (#1631)




If the "MQ client" means MQClientInstance, yes, one MQClientInstance maintains one connection to one broker(but it maintains the connections with all brokers in the cluster).
 And you can create producers/consumers in any numbers in your client-side, each holds one MQClientInstance.

主题: Re: [apache/rocketmq] fix async invoke timeout is not accurate (#1632)



 
 
The scanResponseTable() method is invoked periodically(every one second), it could be late for one second for one particular reponseFuture to be scanned,  in the worst case.  So
 (rep.getBeginTimestamp() + rep.getTimeoutMillis() + 1000) <= System.currentTimeMillis()
 does mean something.
 
 
 
Could you please change the destination branch to devleop?

@henrypoter it seems that you used the dledger mode in your test environment, could you provide more information about your broker config?

> @henrypoter it seems that you used the dledger mode in your test environment, could you provide more information about your broker config?

We use the default config

`[rocketmq@y2zomq213 dledger]$ cat broker.conf 
brokerClusterName = RaftCluster
brokerName=RaftNode00
listenPort=30911
namesrvAddr=192.168.111.212:9876;192.168.111.213:9876;192.168.111.214:9876
enableDLegerCommitLog=true
dLegerGroup=RaftNode00
dLegerPeers=n0-192.168.111.212:40911;n1-192.168.111.213:40911;n2-192.168.111.214:40911

dLegerSelfId=n1
sendMessageThreadPoolNums=16`

the start cmd：

Sorry, there is one mistake in previous comment. 
 If you have more than one producer or consumer in one process, they will share one MQClientInstance, which means share one connection to a particular broker.
If you have more than one producer or consumer in different processes,  MQClientInstance wont be shared and so is the connection.

> 我也遇到了这个问题 现在有解决方案了吗

这是一个设计问题。RocketMQ客户端在广播模式下将消费进度记录在本地，而不是broker端。而admin tool查询的是broker端。因此获取不到消费进度。
如果需要获取广播模式的消费进度，默认在客户端机器的`主目录/.rocketmq_offsets/${clientId}/${groupName}/offsets.json`中。

Before we add the first real CallSnapshot, we should initialize a snapshot with a timestamp ahead of one sampling period, values of 0, and put it in the first.
在我们添加第一次实际采样snapshot之前，应该先初始化这样一个snapshot: 它的时间戳比前者提前一个采样周期，状态值（times & value)是0，并将它放在snapshot list 的第一个位置。

@xiangwangcheng Thanks for your suggestion, I will have a try.

This solution can not cover the situation when sending message timeout  before the `sendMessageAsync` is invoked.
As I mentioned in the issue,  reuse the loop retry logic would be simpler and clearer.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8049014/71053954-30bbb480-218b-11ea-9f31-cad9d0e74673.png)

This make us have two seperated retry logic, one is in charge of resending messages when failed in the sending phrase, the other is in charge of resending when failed in the response-process phrase.
